headline: MKS INSTRUMENTS TYPE 651 CONTROLLER for MKS 653 OR 253 EXHAUST THROTTLE VALVE
description: MKS Type 651 Controller for MKS 653 OR 253 Exhaust Throttle Valve
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Vacuum Valves and Accessories
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Valves and Accessories > Vacuum Valve Controllers
specstable:
Manufacturer MKS Instruments
Model 651CD2S1N
Description Exhaust Throttle Valve Controller
Number of Set Points 5/1
Number of Pressure Gauge Inputs 1
Interface RS 232C
Other Information

The MKS 651 Self-tuning/Digital PID Valve Controller drives MKS 653 or 253 Exhaust Throttle Valves with speed and precision.
Its self-tuning algorithm brings the system to the set point faster than conventional controllers.

Click here for specifications, model decoded on page 16

Click here for the manual

Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 50/60 Hz

Depth 9.750 in (24.8 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
